objects.name: Couch
objects.description: A red leather couch, standing on a carpet.
objects.examine: A lot of scratches cover the surface and the cushion was cut on various spots.

objects.name: Portrait
objects.description: A portrait of an old man.
objects.examine: The old man's eyes glare with wisdom of decades.

objects.name: Desk
objects.description: A desk made of dark cherry red wood with several drawers.
objects.examine: Documents are spread all over it. The chair is missing.

objects.name: Carpet
objects.description: A carpet with a complex pattern of lines and colors.
objects.examine: It's not aligned to the room anymore.

objects.name: Vase
objects.description: A fragile vase without any flowers in it.
